t: Amazon.com : MUFGA 12 Pods Hydroponics Growing System, Indoor Garden with LED Grow Light, Plants Germination Kit, Mini Herb Garden with Pump System, Height Adjustable (No Seed) : Patio, Lawn & Garden
s: This MUFGA system has a high light reach, which will keep my tomatoes growing without snipping them! It also has holes for supports or labels, whichever you wish. The only downfall on this brand is that it doesn't have a timer so you can set specific times to start the garden.

t: Check out this Amazon review of Indoor Garden Hydroponics Growing System - MUFGA 8 Pods Herb Garden Kit Indoor with LED Grow Light, Plants Germination Kit(No Seeds) with Pump System,Height Adjustable, Gift for Women, Black, Black
s: I own several systems by Aerogarden. I thought I would try this system as it is considerably less expensive. It works great! I like the fact that the light can be raised higher than the other brand and that I don't have to empty the tank every four weeks. You will need to buy seeds.
